text: I wonder what kind of questions CAPTCHAs for robots will ask.
Probably something like "Select all squares with a human in them."
Or "Translate this snippet of code into machine language."
"Type the first 100 digits of pi from memory."
"Please prove the Halting problem is solvable."
What if a human fails this new CAPTCHA? Does that make them an honorary robot?
I think it just means they're bad at math and code. So... pretty much a human.
Can we start a club for those who fail? Asking for a friend.
I'm in. I always wanted to be a part of something greater. Like a botnet.
